title: SlashTHEM monsters
data:
- *For other uses, see [monster (disambiguation)](/wiki/Monster_\(disambiguation\) "Monster (disambiguation)").*

This page lists all the monsters that are found in [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") 0.9.7. Currently, the list is a bit sloppy.

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

*"check the stats and add missing pages"*

SlashTHEM monsters

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
For other uses, see monster (disambiguation).

This page lists all the monsters that are found in SlashTHEM 0.9.7. Currently, the list is a bit sloppy.

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

"check the stats and add missing pages"
